ygData.subject: Re: tradeskills
ygData.msgSnippet: Drinking alcohol most definately increases Str and Sta, but if your tolerance is low you will most likely not get to see that affect. At low levels of
ygData.messageBody:
Drinking alcohol most definately increases Str and Sta, but if your
tolerance is low you will most likely not get to see that affect. At low
levels of tolerance the int and agi loss are more then the Str and sta
gain.

Sirensa Qi'Seraph wrote:
>
> From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
>
> In my experience drinking alcohol does not add to strength as I had heard it
> would (maybe some warriors, etc - but not clerics that I have seen) - and
> you wouldn't want to drink while hunting because it makes you interrupt on
> your casting times. It will not affect your wisdom, but the more you drink
> the more your intelligence will drop. It is a pretty useless skill for a
> cleric and more for fun and roleplay, in my opinion.
>
> ~Siren
>
>
